about_the_game:
Great things find their way out of darkness, creating their own light to strike out. Witch's Reign is a Survival-horror type Grid puzzle game, where you're playing as the witch finding her way out of darkness from a monster land. With a Candle, find your way out of the maze but the candle isn't much powerful, you can only see one tile in front of you. Be aware of monsters sleeping in the dark, they wake up as soon as they see any light so blow your candles for safety. There are some nasty traps in the maze stay away from them, maybe USE them.

Key Feature -


> Gameplay includes use of reverbed music for intensive feelings.
> You only get to see a single tile which intensifies the puzzle and you have to remember the maze else you'll get lost.
> Full of complex levels, more levels more puzzles also more monsters👻.
> Includes variety of Steam acheivements to complete but hard enough to acheive.
> Tests your memory in gaming, ability to remember maps and using it in your favor.
